meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Ellen Ciompi Patrick Morrison Danny Parra Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6302.

td.p: Ellen Ciompi, a surgical nurse from Durham, North Carolina
Patrick Morrison, a student of Slavic Studies from Northville, Michigan
Danny Parra, a sportscaster from Miami, Florida (whose 1-day cash winnings total $22,000)

tr.td: AMERICANA
BEFORE THEY WERE FAMOUS
SCIENCE
DEJA VIEW
GIANTS
GANG OF "FOR"

toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'the Macy\'s Thanksgiving Day Parade

Danny
')

Comparing MRI scans of a chimp\'s brain & a human\'s shows that the human\'s is not merely larger; it also contains vastly more white matter connecting these cells vital to the transmission & processing of information')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: (Sarah of the Clue Crew shows us diagrams from the Hall of Human Origins at the Smithsonian.) Comparing MRI scans of a chimp's brain & a human's shows that the human's is not merely larger; it also contains vastly more white matter connecting these cells vital to the transmission & processing of information

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_DJ_2_4', 'clue_DJ_2_4_stuck', '(Danny: What is the BBC?)
(Patrick: What is Sky News?)
[Pause while the judges consider Patrick\'s answer, but it is negged.]
...
(Alex: Patrick, you were on the right track, the correct response is [*], but you wind up in--)
[The end-of-round-signal sounds.]
(Alex: --first place and we\'ve run out of time.)

BSkyB

DannyPatrick
Triple Stumper
')

tr.td: Danny
Patrick

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: [To Ellen] Yes, the Battle of the Little Bighorn. Benteen didn\'t show up in proper order.)
...
(Alex: Our champion gets to relax for a month because starting tomorrow, we have our College Championship, which lasts two weeks, and that\'ll be followed by our Teachers Tournament. Please join us tomorrow.)
EllenWho was General Custer?
$5,000
DannyWho is Custer?
$9,201
PatrickWho is Custer? [a crossed out and replaced by e]
$14,101
General Custer')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'Preserved in the West Point library, his last message reads, "Benteen. Come on. Big village. Be quick. Bring packs"')

tr.td: 1870s PEOPLE
Preserved in the West Point library, his last message reads, "Benteen. Come on. Big village. Be quick. Bring packs"
Danny
Patrick
Ellen
2nd place: $2,000
New champion: $29,601
3rd place: $1,000
Danny
Patrick
Ellen

22 R
(including 1 DD),
4 W

19 R
(including 2 DDs),
3 W

The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
